p.s: The way Gatsby is portrayed in this excerpt hisis different to what we know him as before.
When Gatsby is always shown as this great, confident man, this is the first time we see him struggle and asking Nick for help.
This is especially remarkable since a few pages earlier Gatsby offers a job to Nick.
Apart from that the novel itself is called The Great Gatsby, underlining this fassadefacade of greatness and pure wealth.

We also learn that all this wealth, glamour and the parties were just arranged to impress Daisy, even the house he lives in was jsut bought because it lays at West Egg directly oppsite to TomsTom's and DaisysDaisy's house laying at East Egg.
When the meeting is arranged Gatsby wants everything to be perfect.
Furthermore he is really nervous and hasn't slept the night or at least not much (p. 82, l. 21f.).

Also he seems really lost in his mind and not attentive at all, example for that are in lines 23 to 25 on page 82, Is everything alright? he asked immediately, the grass looks fine if that's what you meant.
What grass?.
In this scene he really just seems like a shell of himself.
Two times this anxiety leads to him almost leaving early, without even seeing Daisy in one occasion (p. 83, l. 13) and (p. 85, l. 29).
Nick calms Gatsby down by reassuring him that DaisysDaisy's is just as nervous and embarassedembarrassed as Gatsby himself.
An indicator for that can be found in line 17 on page 85, as she remembers the exact month Gatsby and her met.
This proof that that he is important to her.
Like often in this book, colours play a big role.
An example for that is DaisysDaisy's lavender hat, as purple is often associated with wealth and financial stability.
Another example is GatsbysGatsby's suit, white is the color of purity, innocence, cleanness, gold and silver on the other hand are symbols of wealth and richness.
These interpretations really fit GatsbysGatsby's character in this excerpt: although he is the insecure, pure person for once, his wealth is always present.
The silver shirt could also be viewed as his love for Daisy as his love for Daisy as it's lurking from his jacket, not really visible but still present.
This would be fitting through silver being a really special and glamourous colour.
